parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Lights

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets intensity of light.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> light [[setLightIntensity]] value

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> light: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> value: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>myLight [[setLightIntensity]] 4;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setLightAmbient]], [[setLightColor]], [[lightAttachObject]], [[lightDetachObject]], [[setLightBrightness]], [[setLightAttenuation]], [[setLightUseFlare]], [[setLightFlareSize]], [[setLightFlareMaxDistance]], [[setLightDayLight]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class='command_description'>
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment><dd class="notedate">Posted on Mar 24, 2014 - 23:37</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:ffur2007slx2_5|ffur2007slx2_5]]<dd class="note">In <template><title>arma3</title></template> ver1.14 [[setLightIntensity]] will overwrite the previous effect processed by [[setLightBrightness]] on the same light source, vice versa. And both of them currently play the same role on brightness, for example: <code>_light [[setLightIntensity]] 3000;// same as _light [[setLightBrightness]] 1;</code>
<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl></root>
